name: emissivity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ability of an object to emit (= send out) heat, compared to the heat emitted by a black object of the same temperature : This machine measures the emissivity of the surface of Venus. These new houses offer residents energy-saving amenities such as low emissivity glass windows. Related word
emit
More examplesFewer examplesLow emissivity glass reflects interior heat back into the room. The amount of radiation emitted is partly determined by the emissivity of the material.This sensor is used to measure emissivity. The metal was painted black to enhance its emissivity.
